lead_paragraph: Defying doubt about marketability, the government said it would sell 19.5 percent of the state oil group to the commodity trading firm Glencore and a Qatari fund.
snippet: Defying doubt about marketability, the government said it would sell 19.5 percent of the state oil group to the commodity trading firm Glencore and a Qatari fund....

headline.main: Despite Sanctions, Russia Finds Buyers for $11 Billion Stake in Rosneft
headline.print_headline: Despite Sanctions, Russia Finds Buyers for Stake in State Oil Group
